_sText:
Do not edit and/or reupload this map. Send any questions/feedback to: Pellevoice@gmail.com

This is a map created for another PlagueFest event, a contest actually. Where it's about creating a map similar to mg_lego_builder created by Epic Jonny a.k.a Robin.

I copied nothing from his .vmf in any way, i created everything from scratch by myself where i also added more features and additions to my liking.

These features includes:

  • 64 player spawn
  • randomized game modes
  • free building
  • 5 different building roles
  • 20 avalible builder slots
  • 10 different building pieces
  • 5 different skins for each building piece
  • total replay-ability
  • randomized game perks (such as hp, speed, lowgrav)

  • randomized game events/suprises

  • APOCALYPSE MODE - meteors rain down while everything explodes, breaking all the pieces they touch, other modes and perks might or might not be mixed up, it's all a free-for-all random frenzy!

This was created over the course of about 4-5 days, along with some testing on the PlagueFest server. I hope it'll be some amusement for you all.

Enjoy!
